Docs.summary: An enumeration of values used by
Docs.remarks: The method takes as a parameter a value. This specifies which alignment instruction (e.g., ) is to be used with the visual format string. For more on the visual format syntax, refer to the Apple document "Visual Format Language" (https://developer.apple.com/library/mac/#documentation/UserExperience/Conceptual/AutolayoutPG/Articles/formatLanguage.html).
